question: USA wins the most gold medals in 2024 Paris Olympics?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the United States of America wins more gold medals than any other country at the 2024 Paris Summer Olympics. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If this country ties with any other for the greatest number of gold medals won, this market will resolve in favor of the country which won the most medals overall. If this also results in a tie, this market will resolve in favor of the country whose registered name comes first in alphabetical order.

This market will resolve based on the medal figures as they stand at after medals are awarded for the final event in the 2024 Paris Summer Olympics. Later changes to medal counts will not be considered toward the resolution of this market.

The resolution source is the final medal table published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC).

events.title: Most gold medals at Paris Olympics?
events.description: This is a market on which country will win the most gold medals at the Paris Olympics.

question: Will Trump announce VP pick before RNC?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald J. Trump announces his pick for his running mate as Vice President of the United States before the start of the Republican National Convention. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The start of the RNC is defined as 12:01 AM ET on the first scheduled day of the convention.

This market will resolve based on the first announcement Donald Trump makes regarding his pick for vice president.

The primary resolution source for this market will be Donald Trump, his campaign, or his official representative(s), however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Trump announce VP pick before RNC?

question: Wimbledon 2024: Djokovic vs. Musetti
description:
This market refers to the Wimbledon semifinals scheduled for July 12, between Novak Djokovic and Lorenzo Musetti. 

This market will resolve to "Djokovic" if Novak Djokovic wins the semifinal match.

This market will resolve to "Musetti" if  Lorenzo Musetti wins the semifinal match.

events.title: Wimbledon 2024: Djokovic vs. Musetti

question: Euro Finals: Spain vs. England
description:
This market refers to the 2024 UEFA European Football Championship Finals match between Spain and England scheduled for July 14, 3:00 PM ET.

If Spain wins the match this market will resolve to "Spain".

If England wins the match this market will resolve to "England".

events.title: Euro Finals: Spain vs. England

question: Will Biden say "Drop out" during July 11 press conference?
description:
Joe Biden is scheduled to speak with press on July 11, 6:30 PM ET. This market refers to anything Biden says during this scheduled event, including any prepared remarks and/or Q&A. You can view the event here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rfFsE-HzzD0.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Biden says "drop out", "drops out", "dropping out", or "dropped out". Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

If Biden does not hold a press conference on July 11, 2024 this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

The resolution source is live video of the press conference. In case of ambiguity, an official transcript and/or a consensus of credible reporting may also be considered.

events.title: What will Biden say during his Press Conference today?
